          <title>
            <string language="en">Position of image in a plane mirror</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Position des Bildes in einem flachen Spiegel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Position d'image dans un miroir plat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Posição da imagem em um espelho plano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Posizione dell'immagine in uno specchio piano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέση της εικόνας σε έναν καθρέφτη αεροπλάνων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Posición de la imagen en un espejo plano</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This ray diagram shows the position of an image seen in a plane mirror.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Strahldiagramm zeigt die Position eines 
Bildes, das in einem flachen Spiegel gesehen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme de rayon montre la position d'une 
image vue dans un miroir plat.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama do raio mostra a posição de uma 
imagem vista em um espelho plano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema del raggio mostra la posizione di 
un'immagine vista in uno specchio piano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα ακτίνων εμφανίζει τη θέση μιας 
εικόνας που βλέπει σε έναν καθρέφτη αεροπλάνων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama del rayo muestra la posición de 
una imagen considerada en un espejo plano.</string>
          </description>
